ssot__ProductCatalog__dlm.name: Product Catalog
ssot__ProductCatalog__dlm.description: The Product Catalog DMO represents a company's inventory or merchandising catalog.

ssot__ActiveFromDate__c.description: The date the catalog is available for use.

ssot__ActiveToDate__c.description: The date the catalog is unavailable.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date when a record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to logical name for system that is source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID to logical name of object where record originated, for example a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to system that External Record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Product Catalog DMO.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the product catalog.
